topics.body: I found something utterly fucking annoying in League; I was playing with someone that was ranked last year, but apparently the only way they got in was they were the biggest fucking kill stealer of all time.  I don't mean as in they were helping out and took the last shot, rather if you were going to kill a enemy player they would go through the entire fucking map just to steal your kill. . . Dude; this isn't Call of Doody.
